adjectives.description: antipill (comparative more antipill, superlative most antipill)

entries.meaning: (not comparable) Preventing or countering the formation of pills on fabric.

examples: This antipill lobbying technique is epitomized by a July 1964 meeting between the Oral Contraception Committee of the FPFJ and representatives from MHW's Drug Bureau and the drug shingikai.
In fact, the 1997 proposal was a binding bylaw amendment prompted by Fleming's refusal to redeem its poison pill despite a 65 percent antipill vote the previous year.
